name: Fariz RM
description: '''Fariz Rustam Munaf''' (born 5 January 1959), better known as '''Fariz RM''', is an Indonesian singer-songwriter and multi-instrumentalist of mixed ethnic [[Minangkabau people|Minangkabau]] and [[Indo people|Dutch-Betawi]] descent. He is the uncle of Indonesian singer-songwriter, [[Sherina Munaf]].
